name: ai-commerce
description: Full-stack e-commerce application with React frontend and NestJS GraphQL backend

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd client && npm run dev" "cd server && npm run start:dev" --names "CLIENT,SERVER" --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd client && npm run preview" "cd server && npm run start:prod" --names "CLIENT,SERVER" --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta"
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf client/node_modules server/node_modules node_modules client/dist server/dist
scripts.db:setup: cd server && npm run db:generate && npm run db:push && npm run db:seed
scripts.lint: cd client && npm run lint && cd ../server && npm run lint
scripts.test: cd client && npm run test && cd ../server && npm run test
